org.teatrove.trove.util.resources
Interface ResourceFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultResourceFactory, PluginContext
public interface ResourceFactory

Method Detail

getResource

URL getResource(String path)
                throws MalformedURLException
Get a associated resource per the specified path. The default method will first check for a local file and then load from the class path. If no file is found, null is returned.

Parameters:
path - The name or path of the resource
Returns:
The associated URL of the resource
Throws:
MalformedURLException - if the given path is an invalid URL

getResourceAsStream

InputStream getResourceAsStream(String path)
Get a associated input stream per the specified path. The default method will first check for a local file and then load from the class path. If no file is found, null is returned.

Parameters:
path - The name or path of the resource
Returns:
The associated input stream of the resource

getResourceAsProperties

PropertyMap getResourceAsProperties(String path)
                                    throws IOException
Get the associated resource as a PropertyMap per the specified path. This will load the resource per getResource(String) and if the resource is not valid, then null is returned. By default, any properties will be auto-substituted by the default substitutions per SubstitutionFactory.getDefaults(). The type of resource is determined by the path. For examples, 'properties' files use a properties resource loader whereas 'xml' files use a XML resource loader. For more information, see PropertyMapFactoryProvider.

Parameters:
path - The name or path of the resource
Returns:
The associated list of properties
Throws:
IOException - If an error occurs loading or parsing the resource

getResourceAsProperties

PropertyMap getResourceAsProperties(String path,
                                    PropertyMap substitutions)
                                    throws IOException
Get the associated resource as a PropertyMap per the specified path. This will load the resource per getResource(String) and if the resource is not valid, then null is returned. Any properties will be auto-substituted by the specified substitutions. The type of resource is determined by the path. For examples, 'properties' files use a properties resource loader whereas 'xml' files use a XML resource loader. For more information, see PropertyMapFactoryProvider.

Parameters:
path - The name or path of the resource
substitutions - The map of substitutions to replace properties with
Returns:
The associated list of properties
Throws:
IOException - If an error occurs loading or parsing the resource
